cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Entity__c.name: cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Entity__c
cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Entity__c.description: This object stores the entities that Business Object API Workflows use.

cgcloud__BO_API_Entity__c.description: Reference to the business object API entity.

cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow__c.description: Reference to the business object API workflow.

cgcloud__Input_Mapping_Field__c.description: Defines the input mapping field. If Output Entity has been set, then this field must also be set.

cgcloud__Output_Entity__c.description: Reference to the business object API entity.

cgcloud__Output_Mapping_Field__c.description: Defines the output mapping field. If Output Entity has been set, then this field must also be set.

cgcloud__Unique_Key__c.description: Stores schema constraints. This is a technical field that the workflow updates.
